quote_first: 'At the third stroke it will be ...' He tiptoed out and returned to the control cabin. '...
quote_last: and twenty seconds.' The voice sounded as clear as if he was hearing it over a phone in London, which he wasn't, not by a long way.
title: So Long, and Thanks for All the Fish
author: Douglas Adams

title: So Long, and Thanks for All the Fish
author: Douglas Adams
